diagnosis_info: Rest and drink plenty of fluids; take over-the-counter cold medications.
Take antiviral medications if prescribed; rest and stay hydrated.
Avoid allergens; use antihistamines or nasal sprays.
Self-isolate and consult a doctor; get tested immediately.
Consult a doctor for antimalarial treatment; avoid mosquito bites.
Requires antibiotic treatment; maintain proper hygiene.
